Package com.gcep.data

Interface RecipesDataServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipesDataService
public interface RecipesDataServiceInterface
Provides the outline of methods for various operations performed with recipes data.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

    • addRecipe

      int addRecipe(RecipeModel recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the system
      Parameters:
      recipe - The recipe information
      Returns:
      Status (1 if successful)

    • updateRecipe

      Updates an existing recipe in the system.
      Parameters:
      updated - The updated recipe information
      Returns:
      Status (1 if successful)

    • deleteRecipeById

      int deleteRecipeById(int recipe_id)
      Removes an existing recipe from the system with the given Recipe ID.
      Parameters:
      recipe_id - The ID number of the recipe.
      Returns:
      The given RecipeModel object if successful, otherwise null

    • recipePublish

      boolean recipePublish(int recipe_id)
      Marks a recipe for publishing. Recipe is not published until it is approved by the service administrator.
      Parameters:
      recipe_id - The ID number of the recipe.
      Returns:
      Status

    • recipeUnpublish

      boolean recipeUnpublish(int recipe_id)
      Removes a recipe from published status. Recipe is not published until it is approved by the service administrator.
      Parameters:
      recipe_id - The ID number of the recipe.
      Returns:
      Status

    • searchRecipesByName

      List<RecipeModel> searchRecipesByName(SearchModel search, boolean noItems)
      Returns a list of recipes with a name matching the search term. If search type is not specified, search defaults to contains
      Parameters:
      search - Search query
      Returns:
      List of Recipe objects

    • searchRecipesByListItems

      List<RecipeModel> searchRecipesByListItems(List<ListItemModel> listItems, boolean noItems)
      Returns a list of recipes that contain the item ids from list_item_ids. Custom items are not supported. list_item_ids should contain the primary keys for list items
      Parameters:
      list_item_ids - The ID numbers of list item entries
      Returns:
      List of Recipe objects
